name: masonCLI
body:
# masonCLI
masonCLI is made for math. It is a command-line interface that does math easily and simply.

Currently, it cannot do a whole lot. However, you are able to program your own apps to get around this.
![The first prompt](http://i.imgur.com/lFVSzv3.png)

Here's an example of masonCLI in action.
![Pythagorean Theorem being solved.](http://i.imgur.com/ZFADu4i.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
